comment:
* Provides the uids of the currently active
     * {@link android.service.voice.HotwordDetectionService} and its owning package. The
     * HotwordDetectionService is an isolated service, so it has a separate uid.

methods.name: public int getIsolatedUid()
methods.comment: Gets the uid of the currently active isolated process hosting the service.

methods.name: public int getOwnerUid()
methods.comment: Gets the uid of the package that provides the HotwordDetectionService.
